text: Clarita Villarba Rivera, better known by her screen name Mila del Sol (May 12, 1923 â€“ November 10, 2020), was a Filipina actress, entrepreneur and philanthropist. She was born in Tondo, Manila, Insular Government of the Philippine Islands. Her career began in 1937. Her best known movie role was in the 1937 movie Giliw Ko. Sol died on November 10, 2020 in Manila at the age of 97.Mila del Sol, Queen of Golden Age PH Cinema, dies ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Manila Category:Filipino philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Manila
title: Mila del Sol
